item.title: Getting started with octave
item.description: Installation or Setup # Instructions on getting octave set up or installed. Installing Octave for debian systems (Debian, Ubuntu): Simple: sudo apt-get install octave Advanced: Well, if you want to install other external packages sudo apt-get install octave-control octave-image octave-io octave-optim octave-signal octave-statistics For furter details like install from PPA. install from sources, etc. A very good detailed wikis are present in Octave’s wiki pages For Debian or Ubuntu look at this - wiki
